subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
lead_paragraph: Pine Island, a favorite in the $2 million Distaff, had to be euthanized after breaking down on Saturday while Bernardini, the favorite in the $5 million Classic, was upset by Invasor.
snippet: Pine Island, a favorite in the $2 million Distaff, had to be euthanized after breaking down on Saturday while Bernardini, the favorite in the $5 million Classic, was upset by Invasor.
